q1.question: What is the s-s-m.ro platform?
q1.answer: s-s-m.ro is a digital platform for managing OHS (Occupational Health and Safety) and Fire Safety compliance. It automates tracking of medical records, fire safety equipment, expiry alerts and report generation for inspections.

q2.question: Who is the platform for?
q2.answer: The platform is designed for OHS consultants managing multiple companies and company administrators who want to internally manage OHS/Fire Safety compliance. It works excellently for portfolios of 1-100+ organizations.

q3.question: How much does it cost and what's included?
q3.answer: €200/year per organization, no setup fees. Cancel anytime. Includes all features: unlimited occupational health, fire safety equipment, daily automated alerts, labor inspection financial risk, PDF reports, priority technical support and daily backup.

q4.question: How does the Occupational Health module work?
q4.answer: You add employee medical records with expiry dates. The platform automatically calculates status (expired, expires in <30 days, valid) and sends daily email alerts for imminent expirations. You have instant overview of all employees in an organization.

q5.question: What fire safety equipment can I manage?
q5.answer: You can manage: fire extinguishers, first aid kits, hydrants, smoke detectors and emergency lighting. For each equipment you add location, last inspection date and expiry date. The system automatically alerts you when re-inspection is needed.

q6.question: How do automated alerts work?
q6.answer: The platform sends daily email (at 08:00 via Resend) with all imminent expirations (30/15/7 days before). WhatsApp and SMS notifications are in development. You can configure recipients for each organization.

q7.question: What does 'Financial Risk' mean?
q7.answer: It's the automatic calculation of potential fines from labor inspection authorities if mandatory documents are missing. The platform analyzes what you don't have in order and shows you min-max estimates according to current legislation.

q8.question: Can I manage multiple companies simultaneously?
q8.answer: Yes! Multi-organization architecture allows unlimited organization management from a single account. Ideal for OHS consultants with large portfolios. Instant filtering and saved preferences per organization.

q9.question: How do I register on the platform?
q9.answer: Contact us at contact@s-s-m.ro to activate your account. After activation, you receive an email with login link. Configure your first organization and you can start adding employees and equipment immediately.

q10.question: Can I bulk import employees?
q10.answer: Currently import is done manually through the employee addition form. CSV/Excel import function is on the roadmap and will be available in Q2 2026. Meanwhile, we support quick addition through the interface.

q11.question: What browsers are supported?
q11.answer: The platform works optimally on Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Edge (latest 2 versions). The interface is 100% responsive and works perfectly on mobile and tablet for on-the-go access.

q12.question: How can I export reports?
q12.answer: PDF reports are generated with 1 click from the dashboard. They are available when data completeness > 80%. Each report includes SHA256 hash for immutability and can be downloaded instantly or sent via email.

q13.question: Is the platform compliant with Romanian OHS legislation?
q13.answer: Yes, the platform fully complies with Law 319/2006 (OHS) and Law 307/2006 (Fire Safety). We automatically update when legislative changes occur. Generated reports are accepted by labor and fire inspections for controls.

q14.question: How is data confidentiality protected (GDPR)?
q14.answer: All data is stored encrypted in Supabase (EU). We respect 100% GDPR: role-based access, complete audit log, data deletion on request. We don't sell/share data with third parties. You can export all your data anytime.

q15.question: Does the platform offer technical support?
q15.answer: Yes! Priority technical support included in subscription: <24h response on email at support@s-s-m.ro. For critical emergencies we offer phone support. Knowledge base and video tutorials available in platform.

rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.exerciseDesc: Send a request to [DPO EMAIL] or through the contact form in the platform. We will respond within a maximum of 30 calendar days.

access.title: Right of access (Art. 15 GDPR)
access.desc: You can request a copy of all personal data we process about you.

rectification.title: Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR)
rectification.desc: You can request correction of inaccurate data or completion of incomplete data.

erasure.title: Right to erasure / "right to be forgotten" (Art. 17 GDPR)
erasure.desc: You can request deletion of your data under certain conditions (e.g. if data is no longer necessary or you withdraw consent).

restriction.title: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
restriction.desc: You can request temporary limitation of data processing in certain situations.

portability.title: Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
portability.desc: You can request your data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format, to transfer it to another controller.

objection.title: Right to object (Art. 21 GDPR)
objection.desc: You can object to processing of your data for certain purposes (e.g. direct marketing).

withdraw.title: Right to withdraw consent
withdraw.desc: When processing is based on consent, you can withdraw it at any time, without affecting the lawfulness of previous processing.

complaint.title: Right to lodge a complaint (Art. 77 GDPR)
complaint.desc: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the National Supervisory Authority for Personal Data Processing (ANSPDCP).
